Title: Ivan Vasilievich: Back to the Future
Writer: Mikhail A. Bulgakov (play), Vladlen Bakhnov, Leonid Gaidai
Actors: Yuriy Yakovlev, Leonid Kuravlyov, Aleksandr Demyanenko, Saveliy Kramarov
Plot: Shurik Timofeev builds a working model of a time machine. By accident, Ivan Bunsha, an apartment complex manager, and George Miloslavsky, a petty burglar, are transferred to the 16th century Moscow, while Tsar Ivan the Terrible goes into the year 1973.
